title: Circular motion - speed of coin in cone

content.question: A coin rolls with constant speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> in a circular path along the inside surface of a cone, as shown. The radius of curvature of the coin’s path is <math alttext="r sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and the surface of the cone is at an angle <math alttext="theta sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> to the horizontal. The coin is then moved to another cone whose surface is at an angle <math alttext="theta sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> such that <math alttext="the tangent of theta sub 1, equals 9 times the tangent of theta sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo> </mo><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo> </mo><mi>tan</mi><mo> </mo><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and the coin travels in a circle with a radius of curvature <math alttext="r sub 1, equals r sub 0 over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> at a constant speed of <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly relates <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> to <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub 1 equals one half v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 1 equals three halves v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 1 equals 3 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 1 equals 6 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub 1 equals three halves v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
